text: Edward Gnat (1 March 1940 – 6 January 2021) was a Polish politician. He was a Deputy from 1985 to 1989 and again from 1993 to 1997. He was born in Maurzyce, Poland. Gnat died, aged 80, in Łódź, of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland.Zmarł działacz ludowy Edward Gnat ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Łódź
title: Edward Gnat
